title: Windows XP Pro SP2 VLK Edition
description:
Happy Hacker Industries presente MICROSOFT.WINDOWS XP             
            Professional SP2 VLK                                              
                                                                              
     ReLeaSe         Windows XP Professional VLK                              
     CoMPaGNie       Microsoft                                                
     GeNRe           Os                                                       
     LaNGue          English                                                  
     ReLeaSe DaTe    February 19th, 2008                                      
     RiPPeR          HHI - Happy Hacker Industries                            
     Iso                                                                      
     Format          standard .ISO file                                       

                                 Description                                  
                                                                              
 Windows XP Professional SP2 VLK oem edition.                                 
 This is the operating system of choice for windows users. This is a virgin   
 installation; it has no user modifications and nothing has been removed      
 from the original cd as shipped from Microsoft. The key provided with this   
 release was acquired from another release that we personally feel was done   
 half-assed. As such, here&#039;s what microsoft actually sent out; with that      
 releases key. *grin*                                                         

                                 Installation                                 
                                                                              
 Use the included ISO burner program. Load the .ISO, burn to a blank cd.      
 It&#039;s ready to be installed. Be sure to write down the valid as of 2.19.2008  
 product key so you have it handy                                             

*key blanked for description purposes only; Key is available inside the .nfo file
